faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for enterprise customers.

faq.question: Is there a free trial?
faq.answer: Yes, all plans include a 14-day free trial with no credit card required.

faq.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faq.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties.
